name: Edge of Twilight (itch)
description:
We were not prepared for the coming Darkness.

We had solved all the problems of the last world, but they left us unprepared for the next.

We saw ahead of us a gathering storm, we stared into the Abyss of the coming night that would devour us

The gathering twilight was upon us.

The sun is going to disappear for 5 years, and the city of Everett must re-outfit itself to survive this crisis. In a world with a solar based economy, this is no small task. Tear down the useless relics of the last world, and start again from nothing. Make fatiguing decisions, and accept their consequences in this turn-based city builder. 

To play the game:

In the build menu, the way to select what you would like to build is the icons at the top left-hand corner.
